---
category: news
title: "Deep learning decodes the principles of differential gene expression"
excerpt: "A goal of biology is to identify the molecular mechanisms that control differential gene expression. Tasaki et al. have developed a framework that integrates genomic data into a deep learning model of transcriptome regulations to predict multiple transcriptional effects in tissue- and person-specific transcriptomes."
